price: 105. Ha noqonnina sida kuwa kala qaybsamay oo iskhilaafay kaddib marka xujooyinka cad ay u yimaadeen. Kuwaana weeye kuwa leh cadaab daran.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُواْ وَٱخۡتَلَفُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna tafarraqū wa-ikh'talafū min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-bayinātu wa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
